document.full_text: u.s. drugmaker merck and german diagnostics firm qiagen are donating millions of human papillomaviros (hpv) vaccines and 250,000 hpv tests to rwanda to start a national cervical cancer prevention program.
document.title: merck, qiagen launch rwandan cervical cancer deal
lines_and_colors: u.s. drugmaker merck and german diagnostics firm qiagen are donating millions of human papillomaviros (hpv) vaccines and 250,000 hpv tests to rwanda to start a national cervical cancer prevention program.
